TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit EventManager extends System.Object
public ref class EventManager abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供事件相关的实用工具方法，这些方法可为类所有者注册路由事件，并添加类处理程序。

span.span: Provides event-related utility methods that register routed events for class owners and add class handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类通常用于注册新的路由的事件， 。This class is most commonly used to register a new routed event, with . 第二个最常用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api](~/includes/tla2sharptla-api-md.md)]使用率。The second most common [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api](~/includes/tla2sharptla-api-md.md)] usage is . 使用此方法启用的路由的事件在类上或附加的事件的类处理。You use this method to enable class handling of a routed event on the class, or an attached event. 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件标记为已处理，和类处理](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)。For details, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用此类可以将新的路由的事件注册为一个类成员，以及路由的事件"包装"方法的重写添加和删除实现[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件。The following example show how to use this class to register a new routed event as a class member, along with the routed event "wrapper" technique of overriding the add and remove implementations for a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event. [!code-csharp[DPCustom#EventManagerClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPCustom/CSharp/default.xaml.cs#eventmanagerclass)] [!code-vb[DPCustom#EventManagerClass](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPCustom/visualbasic/default.xaml.vb#eventmanagerclass)]

summary.span: 为已注册到事件系统的路由事件返回标识符。

span.span: Returns identifiers for routed events that have been registered to the event system.

returns.span: 包含注册对象的 类型的数组。

span.span: An array of type that contains the registered objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更多更高版本注册对象。More objects can be registered later. 此方法获取快照，而且是在应用程序的整个生存期内可写的路由事件的集合。This method gets a snapshot and the collection of routed events is writeable throughout an application's lifetime. 返回的集合可能会很大。The collection returned might be quite large. 即使只需计算的一部分的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]，高达数百是集合计数。Even just counting the events that are part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)], the collection count is in the high hundreds.

summary.span: 查找使用所提供的所有者类型注册的事件的所有路由事件标识符。

span.span: Finds all routed event identifiers for events that are registered with the provided owner type.

returns.span: 如果找到任何匹配项，则返回匹配路由事件标识符的数组；否则返回 。

span.span: An array of matching routed event identifiers if any match is found; otherwise, .

summary.span: 为特定路由事件注册类处理程序。

span.span: Registers a class handler for a particular routed event.

public: static void RegisterClassHandler(Type ^ classType, System::Windows::RoutedEvent ^ routedEvent, Delegate ^ handler);
static member RegisterClassHandler : Type * System.Windows.RoutedEvent * Delegate -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: classType
param.span: 声明类处理的类的类型。

span.span: The type of the class that is declaring class handling.

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 要处理的事件的路由事件标识符。

span.span: The routed event identifier of the event to handle.

param.name: handler
param.span: 对类处理程序实现的引用。

span.span: A reference to the class handler implementation.

summary.span: 为特定路由事件注册类处理程序。

span.span: Registers a class handler for a particular routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类处理是一项功能，可用于路由事件，包括使用路由事件支持实现的附加的事件。Class handling is a feature that is available for routed events, including attached events that are implemented with routed event backing. 类处理程序就像存在的所有实例的类的静态处理程序。A class handler is like a static handler that exists for all instances of the class. 由于是静态的处理程序，不能更改实例属性直接与类处理程序，但可以访问通过实例`sender`参数和/或事件数据。Because the handler is static, you cannot change instance properties directly with a class handler, but you can access instances through the `sender` parameter and/or the event data. 在实例处理程序之前调用类处理程序。Class handlers are invoked before instance handlers. 您可以实现的类处理程序已将事件标记为已处理的行为。You can implement a class handler that has the behavior of marking the event as handled. 因此，除非专门为已处理的事件注册的实例处理程序，不会调用类处理的事件的实例处理程序。Therefore, instance handlers for a class-handled event are not invoked unless the instance handlers register specifically for handled events. 许多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基元素事件提供类处理虚方法。Many of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] base element events provide class handling virtual methods. 可以通过重写继承的基类的类中的这些方法，实现类处理而无需调用在静态构造函数中。By overriding these methods in classes that inherit the base classes, you can implement class handling without calling in static constructors. 通常，这些类处理方法的输入事件存在，并且具有以"On"开头，且正进行类处理的事件的名称结尾的名称。These class handling methods typically exist for input events and have names that start with "On" and end with the name of the event being class handled. 有关类处理的详细信息，请参阅[路由事件标记为已处理，和类处理](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)。For more information about class handling, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md). 使用此签名，类处理程序将注册要调用仅在响应未处理的事件。Using this signature, class handlers will be registered to invoke only in response to unhandled events. 您还可以注册类处理程序调用，即使事件自变量标记为已处理，通过使用签名，使用`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。You can also register class handlers to invoke even if the event arguments are marked handled, by using the signature, with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例添加的处理程序，则调用。The following example adds a handler for , calling . [!code-csharp[ClassHandling#StaticAndRegisterClassHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClassHandling/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#staticandregisterclasshandler)] [!code-vb[ClassHandling#StaticAndRegisterClassHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClassHandling/visualbasic/sdksamplelibrary/class1.vb#staticandregisterclasshandler)]

public: static void RegisterClassHandler(Type ^ classType, System::Windows::RoutedEvent ^ routedEvent, Delegate ^ handler, bool handledEventsToo);
static member RegisterClassHandler : Type * System.Windows.RoutedEvent * Delegate * bool -> unit

param.name: classType
param.span: 声明类处理的类的类型。

span.span: The type of the class that is declaring class handling.

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 要处理的事件的路由事件标识符。

span.span: The routed event identifier of the event to handle.

param.name: handler
param.span: 对类处理程序实现的引用。

span.span: A reference to the class handler implementation.

param.name: handledEventsToo
param.span: 如果即使已将路由事件的参数标记为已处理时也调用此类处理程序，则为 ；如果保留不对任何标记为已处理的事件调用处理程序的默认行为，则为 。

span.span: to invoke this class handler even if arguments of the routed event have been marked as handled; to retain the default behavior of not invoking the handler on any marked-handled event.

summary.span: 使用处理事件数据已标记为已处理的事件的选项，为特定路由事件注册类处理程序。

span.span: Registers a class handler for a particular routed event, with the option to handle events where event data is already marked handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类处理是一项功能，可用于路由事件，包括使用路由事件支持实现的附加的事件。Class handling is a feature that is available for routed events, including attached events that are implemented with routed event backing. 类处理程序就像存在的所有实例的类的静态处理程序。A class handler is like a static handler that exists for all instances of the class. 由于是静态的处理程序，不能更改实例属性直接与类处理程序，但可以访问通过实例`sender`参数和/或事件数据。Because the handler is static, you cannot change instance properties directly with a class handler, but you can access instances through the `sender` parameter and/or the event data. 在实例处理程序之前调用类处理程序。Class handlers are invoked before instance handlers. 您可以实现的类处理程序已将事件标记为已处理的行为。You can implement a class handler that has the behavior of marking the event as handled. 因此，除非专门为已处理的事件注册的实例处理程序，不会调用类处理的事件的实例处理程序。Therefore, instance handlers for a class-handled event are not invoked unless the instance handlers register specifically for handled events. 许多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基元素事件提供类处理虚方法。Many of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] base element events provide class handling virtual methods. 可以通过重写继承的基类的类中的这些方法，实现类处理而无需调用在静态构造函数中。By overriding these methods in classes that inherit the base classes, you can implement class handling without calling in static constructors. 通常，这些类处理方法的输入事件存在，并且具有以"On"开头，且正进行类处理的事件的名称结尾的名称。These class handling methods typically exist for input events and have names that start with "On" and end with the name of the event being class handled. 有关类处理的详细信息，请参阅[路由事件标记为已处理，和类处理](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)。For more information about class handling, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md). 使用此签名，类处理程序可以注册已处理的事件时调用通过设置`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。Using this signature, class handlers can be registered to invoke upon handled events, by setting `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. 通常情况下，仅当你尝试解决问题，例如鼠标或键盘事件从输入系统处理的已知的处理问题应进行此操作。Generally, you should do this only if there is a known handling issue you are trying to work around, such as input system handling from mouse or keyboard events.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.RoutedEvent RegisterRoutedEvent (string name, System.Windows.RoutingStrategy routingStrategy, Type handlerType, Type ownerType);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.RoutedEvent RegisterRoutedEvent(string name, valuetype System.Windows.RoutingStrategy routingStrategy, class System.Type handlerType, class System.Type ownerType) cil managed

static member RegisterRoutedEvent : string * System.Windows.RoutingStrategy * Type * Type -> System.Windows.RoutedEvent

param.name: name

span.span: The name of the routed event.

param.span: 该名称在所有者类型中必须是唯一的，并且不能为 或空字符串。

span.span: The name must be unique within the owner type and cannot be or an empty string.

param.name: routingStrategy
param.span: 作为枚举值的事件的路由策略。

span.span: The routing strategy of the event as a value of the enumeration.

param.name: handlerType

span.span: The type of the event handler.

param.span: 该类型必须为委托类型，并且不能为 。

span.span: This must be a delegate type and cannot be .

param.name: ownerType
param.span: 路由事件的所有者类类型。

span.span: The owner class type of the routed event.
This cannot be .

summary.span: 向 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 事件系统注册新的路由事件。

span.span: Registers a new routed event with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] event system.

returns.span: 新注册的路由事件的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the newly registered routed event.

returns.span: 现在可将该标识符对象存储为类中的静态字段，然后将其用作将处理程序附加到事件的方法的参数。

span.span: This identifier object can now be stored as a static field in a class and then used as a parameter for methods that attach handlers to the event.

returns.span: 路由事件标识符也用于其他事件系统 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。

span.span: The routed event identifier is also used for other event system [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的返回值创建一个唯一的静态声明标识符字段。Use the return value of this method to create the static declaration for a unique identifier field. 此字段应存储在所有者类型。This field should be stored within the owner type. 有了相当多的约定和与如何路由事件相关联的最佳做法应名为、 注册，并在类中公开。There are a considerable number of conventions and best practices associated with how routed events should be named, registered, and exposed in a class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
